## Types and classes
### Types

```{r}
typeof(1.5)
typeof("la vida")
typeof('same shit')
typeof(FALSE)
typeof(1L)
typeof(1)
typeof(typeof)
typeof(list())
```

### Classes

```{r}

data(iris)
typeof(iris)
class(iris)

class(1L)

```

Most of the types have a hardware version (not for advanced ones like list). Classes are a way to create types as a developer.
